casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Abdullah HAMID (Aka: Antonio Mosley) No. 322P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Mr. Antonio Mosley, for Hamid, Abdullah (aka Antonio Mosley). Mr. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for the State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 25th of September 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of September 2017 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
